name: Towergirls: the Game

files.game_archive: N/A:'Select the release archive file from https://towerkc.blogspot.com/'

content:
files:
- game_archive: N/A:'Select the release archive file from https://towerkc.blogspot.com/'
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Towergirls/Towergirls.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Towergirls/
    file: game_archive
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43 d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: tkg-shadervalidator-4.5-x86_64
